verses.text: <a href="../1-Kings-4-1/" title="1 Kings 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
2 "JESUS_END"And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,

<a href="../1-Kings-4-3/" title="1 Kings 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
4 "JESUS_END"And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
5 "JESUS_END"And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king's friend:
6 "JESUS_END"And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-7/" title="1 Kings 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
8 "JESUS_END"And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-9/" title="1 Kings 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Bethshemesh, and Elonbethhanan:
10 "JESUS_END"The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:

<a href="../1-Kings-4-11/" title="1 Kings 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

12 "JESUS_END"Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Bethshean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Bethshean to Abelmeholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:

13 "JESUS_END"The son of Geber, in Ramothgilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
14 "JESUS_END"Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:
15 "JESUS_END"Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
16 "JESUS_END"Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-17/" title="1 Kings 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-18/" title="1 Kings 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
19 "JESUS_END"Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.
20 "JESUS_END"Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-21/" title="1 Kings 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-22/" title="1 Kings 4:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"And Solomon's provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,

<a href="../1-Kings-4-23/" title="1 Kings 4:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23  "JESUS_END"Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
24 "JESUS_END"For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-25/" title="1 Kings 4:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25  "JESUS_END"And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beersheba, all the days of Solomon.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-26/" title="1 Kings 4:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-27/" title="1 Kings 4:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27  "JESUS_END"And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon's table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.
28 "JESUS_END"Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
29 "JESUS_END"And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-30/" title="1 Kings 4:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30  "JESUS_END"And Solomon's wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-31/" title="1 Kings 4:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31  "JESUS_END"For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-32/" title="1 Kings 4:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32  "JESUS_END"And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

33 "JESUS_END"And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-34/" title="1 Kings 4:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34  "JESUS_END"And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
